Articles.Content: Is it correct that 15GW being transmitted from the largest transceiver at KSC only reaches about as far as the runway?

Is it correct that 15GW being transmitted from the largest transceiver at KSC only reaches about as far as the runway?

It has to do with direction of both reciever and transmitter. If your transmitter is pointed straight up you aren't going to be getting much power.
any time this will get an update for 0.90? did fractaluk said anything about it?

any time this will get an update for 0.90? did fractaluk said anything about it?

He hasn't posted since last month.

Which version of tweakscale? I had that problem with 1.47, but reversion to 1.44 fixed it(along with other issues).

i could kiss you right now! XD this solved my issue, an issue plaguing me for as long as i can remember!!! thank you kind sir, reverting to 1.44 seems to have solved the problem from what i can tell which means i can finally use interstellar again! much apprication kind sir and or madam

Is it correct that 15GW being transmitted from the largest transceiver at KSC only reaches about as far as the runway?

Only reciever orientation matters. Transmitters and relays are omni-broadcasting. Don't expect much from your rover-based power station, it's signal gets occluded by Kerbin's horizont fast. Common practice is huge power station on low kerbin orbit and 3 relays on high (800km+) kerbin orbir in a form of triagnle.

Edited December 24, 2014 by DivisionByZero

Done.

Don't quote the whole post, guys, it looks messy.

Hey Boris, I just added your build to an existing 0.90 save game, and now my tech tree is completely blank after selecting the KSPI tree. Started a new game, selected the tree, and the nodes are visible like they should be.

I had an unupgraded research facility in both the existing and the new testing game.

Anyone else run into this or have a workaround? I was a decent ways into the new 0.90 career mode and I really don't want to start over.

EDIT: I had restarted KSP already, thinking that might fix it. That didn't work. But after loading the new test career mode game, then exiting to the main menu and loading my existing 0.90 career, the tree is now visible again. Not sure what to make of that, but it seems to work now. LOL

Thanks so much for making this build! KSP without KSPI just isn't the same for me anymore.

Changes from the latest FractalUK Release:

Version 0.13.1

-Microvawe network behaviour is now more stable, as is it's performance

-Adapted Interstellar mod and TechManager for KSP version 0.90

-Nothing's changed in gameplay, it's adaptation and bugfix release.

Known bugs:

-Mk3 cargo bay and flat radiator .tga textures sometimes don't load right (you get pure white color instead). I've seen a couple of posts reporting this, but at the moment i don't know the exact cause.

-first load of new science tree will probably fail. Description - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-25-KSP-Interstellar-%28Magnetic-Nozzles-ISRU-Revamp%29-Version-0-13?p=1627181&viewfull=1#post1627181

Feel free to report bugs here or on github, if i'll have some spare time i'll try to fix them.
